languages.text: "Полагаю, потому что это представитель {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}, Ваша Светлость, подобный тон — часть их, кхм, особенностей". {n}Сенешаль хмурится.{/n} "Проктор, перед вами — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, Помазанни{mf|к|ца} Императора и держатель{mf||ница} священного Патента. Касательно целей {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости на планете — вы не в праве требовать ответа. Относитесь к Лорд-капитану с тем же уважением, которое выказывали Леди Теодоре... Ныне покойной".

"His being a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, I presume. One might say such a tone is... an attribute of their occupation, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Proctor, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the Emperor's anointed and bearer of the sacred Warrant. As for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s business on this planet, I'm afraid you do not have the authority to demand an answer. I would ask that you treat the Lord Captain with the same respect that you gave Lady Theodora... the late Lady Theodora."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, потому что это представитель {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}, Ваша Светлость, подобный тон — часть их, кхм, особенностей". {n}Сенешаль хмурится.{/n} "Проктор, перед вами — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, Помазанни{mf|к|ца} Императора и держатель{mf||ница} священного Патента. Касательно целей {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости на планете — вы не в праве требовать ответа. Относитесь к Лорд-капитану с тем же уважением, которое выказывали Леди Теодоре... Ныне покойной".

As for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s business on this planet, I'm afraid you do not have the right to demand an answer. I would ask that you treat the Lord Captain with the same respect that you gave Lady Theodora... the late Lady Theodora."

One might say such a tone is... an attribute of their occupation, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Proctor, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the Emperor's anointed and bearer of the sacred Warrant. As for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s business on this planet, I'm afraid you do not have the authority to demand an answer. I would ask that you treat the Lord Captain with the same respect that you gave Lady Theodora... the late Lady Theodora."

languages.text: "Das ist wohl dem Umstand geschuldet, dass er dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} angehört. Man könnte sagen, sein Ton ist ... eine Art Berufskrankheit, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Proktor, vor Euch steht {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, {mf|Gesalbter|Gesalbte} des Imperators und {mf|Träger|Trägerin} des Handelsbriefs. Was die Geschäfte {mf|Seiner Lordschaft|Ihrer Lordschaft} auf diesem Planeten angeht, fürchte ich, steht es Euch nicht zu, eine Antwort zu fordern. Ich würde Euch daher bitten, dem Lord Captain mit demselben Respekt zu begegnen, den Ihr Lady Theodora entgegengebracht habt ... möge ihre Seele in Frieden ruhen."
languages.original_text: "His being a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, I presume. One might say such a tone is... an attribute of their occupation, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Proctor, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the Emperor's anointed and bearer of the sacred Warrant. "Das ist wohl dem Umstand geschuldet, dass er dem Adeptus Arbites angehört. Man könnte sagen, sein Ton ist ... eine Art Berufskrankheit, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Proktor, vor Euch steht {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, {mf|Gesalbter|Gesalbte} des Imperators und {mf|Träger|Trägerin} des Handelsbriefs. Was die Geschäfte {mf|Seiner Lordschaft|Ihrer Lordschaft} auf diesem Planeten angeht, fürchte ich, steht es Euch nicht zu, eine Antwort zu fordern. Ich würde Euch daher bitten, dem Lord Captain mit demselben Respekt zu begegnen, den Ihr Lady Theodora entgegengebracht habt ... möge ihre Seele in Frieden ruhen."

languages.text: « Sans doute le fait qu'il est membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Il n'est pas exagéré d'affirmer qu'un tel ton est... caractéristique de sa profession, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Proctor, vous avez devant vous {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|porteur de l'onction impériale et détenteur|porteuse de l'onction impériale et détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée. Quant aux affaires de Sa Seigneurie sur cette planète, je crains fort que vous n'ayez pas l'autorité requise pour exiger une réponse. Je vous demande donc de traiter {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} avec le même respect que vous témoigniez à Dame Théodora... feu Dame Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "His being a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, I presume. One might say such a tone is... an attribute of their occupation, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Proctor, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the Emperor's anointed and bearer of the sacred Warrant. As for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s business on this planet, I'm afraid you do not have the authority to demand an answer. I would ask that you treat the Lord Captain with the same respect that you gave Lady Theodora... the late Lady Theodora."

Il n'est pas exagéré d'affirmer qu'un tel ton est... caractéristique de sa profession, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Proctor, vous avez devant vous {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|porteur de l'onction impériale et détenteur|porteuse de l'onction impériale et détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée. Je vous demande donc de traiter {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} avec le même respect que vous témoigniez à Dame Théodora... feu Dame Théodora. »

« Sans doute le fait qu'il est membre de l'Adeptus Arbites. Il n'est pas exagéré d'affirmer qu'un tel ton est... caractéristique de sa profession, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Proctor, vous avez devant vous {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|porteur de l'onction impériale et détenteur|porteuse de l'onction impériale et détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée. Quant aux affaires de Sa Seigneurie sur cette planète, je crains fort que vous n'ayez pas l'autorité requise pour exiger une réponse. Je vous demande donc de traiter {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} avec le même respect que vous témoigniez à Dame Théodora... feu Dame Théodora. »

languages.text: «Por ser miembro del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, supongo. Se podría decir que su tono es un... rasgo propio de su oficio, {mf|milord|milady}». {n}Abelard frunce el ceño.{/n} «Procurador, se halla usted en presencia {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, {mf|elegido|elegida} del Emperador y {mf|portador|portadora} de su sagrada Patente. En cuanto a los asuntos que traen a {mf|milord|milady} a este planeta, me temo que carece usted de autoridad para exigir una respuesta. Rogaría que dispensase {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán el mismo respeto que mostraría para con lady Theodora... la difunta lady Theodora».
languages.original_text: "His being a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, I presume. One might say such a tone is... an attribute of their occupation, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Proctor, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the Emperor's anointed and bearer of the sacred Warrant. As for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s business on this planet, I'm afraid you do not have the authority to demand an answer. I would ask that you treat the Lord Captain with the same respect that you gave Lady Theodora... the late Lady Theodora."

Se podría decir que su tono es un... rasgo propio de su oficio, {mf|milord|milady}». {n}Abelard frunce el ceño.{/n} «Procurador, se halla usted en presencia {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, {mf|elegido|elegida} del Emperador y {mf|portador|portadora} de su sagrada Patente. Rogaría que dispensase {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán el mismo respeto que mostraría para con lady Theodora... la difunta lady Theodora».

languages.text: “或许是因为他是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}法务部{/g}的成员吧。他们说话就是这个语气……这或许是他们的职业习惯，大人。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉。{/n}“监察官，站在你面前的人是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，帝皇的神选者，神圣授状的持有者。至于大人来这颗行星的目的，恐怕你无权要求大人向你解释。我希望你对待舰长大人的态度，能像对待西奥多拉夫人……已故的西奥多拉夫人那样。”
languages.original_text: "His being a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, I presume. One might say such a tone is... an attribute of their occupation, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Proctor, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the Emperor's anointed and bearer of the sacred Warrant. As for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s business on this planet, I'm afraid you do not have the authority to demand an answer. I would ask that you treat the Lord Captain with the same respect that you gave Lady Theodora... the late Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: “或许是因为他是法务部的成员吧。他们说话就是这个语气……这或许是他们的职业习惯，大人。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉。{/n}“监察官，站在你面前的人是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，帝皇的神选者，神圣授状的持有者。至于大人来这颗行星的目的，恐怕你无权要求大人向你解释。我希望你对待舰长大人的态度，能像对待西奥多拉夫人……已故的西奥多拉夫人那样。”
“或许是因为他是法务部的成员吧。他们说话就是这个语气……这或许是他们的职业习惯，大人。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉。{/n}“监察官，站在你面前的人是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，帝皇的神选者，神圣授状的持有者。至于大人来这颗行星的目的，恐怕你无权要求大人向你解释。我希望你对待舰长大人的态度，能像对待西奥多拉夫人……已故的西奥多拉夫人那样。”

languages.text: 「彼が{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}高等裁定局所属{/g}だからでしょう。あの口調は…職務に特有のものかと思われます」{n}アベラードは眉をひそめた。{/n}「代理人殿、目の前に立つこのお方は、ローグトレーダーの{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様です。皇帝陛下から聖なる令状を授かっています。この惑星における閣下の活動については、残念ながらあなたにはその説明を求める権限がありません。ロード・キャプテンには、かつてレディ・シオドーラ…いや、故レディ・シオドーラに払っていたのと同じ敬意を持って接していただきたいと思います」
languages.original_text: "His being a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, I presume. One might say such a tone is... an attribute of their occupation, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Proctor, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the Emperor's anointed and bearer of the sacred Warrant. As for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s business on this planet, I'm afraid you do not have the authority to demand an answer. I would ask that you treat the Lord Captain with the same respect that you gave Lady Theodora... the late Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: 「彼が高等裁定局所属だからでしょう。あの口調は…職務に特有のものかと思われます」{n}アベラードは眉をひそめた。{/n}「代理人殿、目の前に立つこのお方は、ローグトレーダーの{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様です。皇帝陛下から聖なる令状を授かっています。この惑星における閣下の活動については、残念ながらあなたにはその説明を求める権限がありません。ロード・キャプテンには、かつてレディ・シオドーラ…いや、故レディ・シオドーラに払っていたのと同じ敬意を持って接していただきたいと思います」

「彼が高等裁定局所属だからでしょう。あの口調は…職務に特有のものかと思われます」{n}アベラードは眉をひそめた。{/n}「代理人殿、目の前に立つこのお方は、ローグトレーダーの{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様です。皇帝陛下から聖なる令状を授かっています。この惑星における閣下の活動については、残念ながらあなたにはその説明を求める権限がありません。ロード・キャプテンには、かつてレディ・シオドーラ…いや、故レディ・シオドーラに払っていたのと同じ敬意を持って接していただきたいと思います」

languages.text: "Tahminimce {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} mensubu olması. Bu ses tonunun, mesleğinin gerektirdiği bir tavırdan kaynaklandığını söyleyebiliriz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Abelard kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Üsteğmen, karşınızda gördüğünüz zat, İmparator'un kutsanmışı ve Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin Hamili Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius'tur. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin bu gezegendeki varlığı hususuna gelecek olursak ne yazık ki bu sorunun cevabını talep etme yetkisine sahip değilsiniz. Sizden... Merhum Leydi Theodora'ya gösterdiğiniz saygının aynısını göstererek Lord Kaptan ile konuşmanızı rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "His being a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, I presume. One might say such a tone is... an attribute of their occupation, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Proctor, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the Emperor's anointed and bearer of the sacred Warrant. As for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s business on this planet, I'm afraid you do not have the authority to demand an answer. I would ask that you treat the Lord Captain with the same respect that you gave Lady Theodora... the late Lady Theodora."

As for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s business on this planet, I'm afraid you do not have the authority to demand an answer. traits.locale_text: RM_ArbitesFirstMeeting_Abelard_01
